name: Planet Hopper (Margeli)
description:
Game done for the "Beginners Circle Jam 3" by BigoTeam, composed by 2 developers and the help of an artist. 

The game is a prototype developed in Unity engine, all the assets are hand-made except for the skybox, the font and the music used. So far there's only a playable level.

The game consists of a blob that has to reach the end of the local planetary system hopping through planets and discovering the secret of the universe before the star dies absorbing all the planets.

Creators:

Carles Margelí (developer): https://github.com/Margeli

Albert Mas (developer): https://github.com/albertmas

Pol Carrera (artist): https://github.com/polcarcat
